header.description: Report header scalars: date range boundaries and generation timestamp. date_from and date_to come from user parameters; generated_at is injected by the runtime at report generation time.

rows.description: One row per notification record from app_notifications, filtered by the time column within the selected date range. Displays notification ID, type, message, user, read status, and timestamp.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are required filter parameters that bound the query on app_notifications.time. generated_at is a pass-through runtime scalar (current datetime) and does not filter or join any table.
transformations: No reshape needed â€” data is a flat single-table query from app_notifications.
Filter rows where app_notifications.time is between date_from and date_to.
Order results by app_notifications.time descending so the most recent notifications appear first.
